TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OdbcError extends System.Object

summary.span: 收集與資料來源所傳回警告或錯誤相關的資訊。

span.span: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別由每當發生錯誤。This class is created by the whenever an error occurs. 每個執行個體由然後受類別，接著由類別。Each instance of created by the is then managed by the class, which in turn is created by the class. 如果發生嚴重錯誤，伺服器可能會關閉 。If the severity of the error is too great, the server may close the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的屬性類別。The following example displays the properties of the class. summary.span: 取得遵循資料庫 ANSI SQL 標準的五個字元的錯誤碼。

span.span: Gets the five-character error code that follows the ANSI SQL standard for the database.

value.span: 五個字元的錯誤碼，如果可以從一個以上的位置發出錯誤，則識別錯誤的來源。

span.span: The five-character error code, which identifies the source of the error if the error can be issued from more than one place.
